/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day. Cars are driving on the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the city. The image beautifully encapsulates the vibrant life and architectural grandeur of Beijing.
